segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman and two children present.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the sink immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my goodness, the water is just pouring over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a wide puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, standing right there, doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the water, yet she keeps polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about her slipping on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause a serious accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will damage the cabinets too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a mess building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely oblivious to it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
